page.title: 19Yetholm Housewife
page.content: Day in the life of village garage proprieter's wife. {7am}Up. Breakfast. Dad out 7.45am to open garage.{8.15}Fiona to bus to Kelso High School.{8.45}Euan to Primary School. Housework- dishes, beds, washing into machine. Go to Kelso- Spare parts needed in a hurry. Fields very green with patches of brilliant yellow- oil seed rape in full bloom, back to Yetholm.Shopping- Stewart's - milk, rolls. Adams- newspapers, groceries. Butchers- mince Washing out. Hoover. Dust.{12noon} Bacon Rolls, yogurt & fruit for Euan, Dad & I. Finish housework. Weekly wages to make up.{3.30pm}Do school bus run with car- fewer children today. { {4.30pm}Fiona home.{5.30pm}Mince, potatoes, cattots, peas, apple sponge & custard.{6.30}Dad back to work{7.30} Mum to meeting. {10}supper {11pm}Bed.
